entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
